experience.title: Data Scientist & Artificial Intelligence Engineer
details: Member of the GenAI Lab – Designing Innovative Generative AI Solutions

AI-Powered HR Platform – Intelligent CV Management System: Multi-agent GenAI solution built with Google's Agent Development Kit (ADK), Smart document parsing with entity extraction and metadata enrichment, Semantic search using vector embeddings and retrieval via Vertex AI

Supply Chain Analyzer – GenAI-Powered Logistics Intelligence System: Cloud-native GenAI system for analyzing international supply chain constraints, Document search pipeline powered by Amazon Titan and OpenSearch Service, Final AI responses generated using Claude 3.5 Sonnet via Amazon Bedrock
Computer System Validation (CSV) Platform – Pharmaceutical Industry: Multi-agent GenAI system designed for automated validation and compliance analysis in pharmaceutical environments
